title: Looking For Team or Team Players! Any Rank Just no feeds and looking to play REG Contact me in game
body:
I mainly play mid but can play any lane looking for people who use skype and want to climb up if we go pro awesome if not thats a shame
i want people who like lol for what it is who dont just feed or say gg after first death and throw 
sure i get angry everyone does but i dont rage i play through till the end believing that my team can pull it back (reasonably i sometimes surr)
you dont have to be on every day but i dont want to waste an inv on u to join my team if u play 1 day a fortnight{{champion:84}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:84}}

replies.body: hey im on every weekend and i play during the week im bronze 1 and im pretty chill i use skype and i play mostly anyrole, ive added you so give me a shout when you are online

Hey Dude, I've sent you a friend request. I'm a returning player looking to get back in the game. I'm not fused about which role to play but i would pref top or mid as these are the heros i remember how to play. Hit me up when you're online next.
